actions.text: Amendment SA 2469 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2469 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12512) To authorize $1,440,000 in planning and design funds for a replacement C-130 aircraft maintenance hangar at Air National Guard New Castle County Airport, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2469 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Carper.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2469 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To authorize $1,440,000 in planning and design funds for a replacement C-130 aircraft maintenance hangar at Air National Guard New Castle County Airport, and to provide an offset.
